name: Agent Z: Zombie Rescue Service Ranger
name_original: Agent Z: Zombie Rescue Service Ranger
description:
This game is really dumb. The original idea began as "I want to invade a police station to rescue my zombie baby from the evil humans", and turned into "holy crap this won't be done in time, i'll just make it violent"

Hope you enjoy. This game should be played by no one.
